response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product to you. This item holds immense value to us, but given its significance to you, we believe it's a perfect match. We are offering this exceptional product to you at a special price of $14,500. We understand that this investment might be substantial, but we are confident that it will provide you with unparalleled benefits and satisfaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you with our top-tier solution.", "product_price": 14500}
